about_the_game:
Become a coach of figure skaters and aim for the championship in the highest competition, “On the Edge”. A training simulation game with attractive characters and beautiful 3D!

Train your athletes

You are the coach of a figure skater and train the athletes in your charge to win the competition.

Compose the program

Decide on the music, costumes, and tricks that your athletes will perform at the competition.
It is up to you, the coach, to choose a composition that matches the athletes' abilities or a risky but high-scoring one-shot composition!

Participate in competitions

Compete in competitions with the athletes you have trained and the programs you have created.
The athletes will perform according to your instructions.
Trust your athletes and pray for their victory!

Multiple stories and endings

The story will diverge depending on your wins and losses in the competition and your interactions with your rivals. Can you reach the best ending?
